short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your companion sidecar that can provide a safety check of AI chats and web content for accuracy, bias and toxicity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sidecar Preview by AutoAlign provides instant fact-checking at your fingertips by seamlessly interacting with every major generative AI chatbot — like ChatGPT — to verify information in real-time. It also effortlessly assesses information across the entire web by allowing users to easily highlight content during their entire browsing experience.
Sidecar puts control over AI interactions without complex setups. It works seamlessly with OpenAI's latest ChatGPT models, Google's Gemini 1.5, Anthropic's Claude 3.5 models, and Microsoft's Copilot AI Assistant. It also functions on any website by allowing users to highlight content to check for factuality, bias, and toxicity.
Just look for the Sidecar bird and know that correct information is just a click away. 

Key Features:
Instant Verification: Click Sidecar to check content for inaccuracies. then receive a detailed breakdown with sourced and accurate information.
In-Depth Analysis: Easily understand content accuracy through categorized ratings — high, medium, low — which include insights on toxicity, age, and gender bias.
Interactive Corrections: Explore, fix, and rewrite text with enhanced accuracy based on Sidecar’s analysis.
Trusted Sources: Utilizes a robust database of reliable websites for accurate comparisons.
Privacy-Focused: Ensures secure verification without storing your browsing data.

Sidecar is powered by AutoAlign’s proprietary AI technology and leading LLMs from OpenAI, Anthropics, Google, and Meta.

Browse with confidence by downloading Sidecar today!
Any questions, suggestions, or feedback? Please visit us at https://www.autoalign.ai/ and contact us at: sidecar@autoalign.ai
